overview: Does it make you gay if your Roommate sucks your dick? Mitch Vaughn didn't think so, even so, that he even stick his dick up Trent Diesel's asshole. These men are living with their straight friends, they have nasty fantasies about them and luckily for them when their friends get horny and no-one else is around those fantasies come true, maybe, after all, they aren't so straight, they just have to make sure that their girlfriends will never find out.
title: My Straight Roommate 13
